title: XForms
description: This is the XForms stencil set specification.

stencils.title: XForm
stencils.description: A XForms form.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs> <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:maximumSize="200 160" oryx:minimumSize="50 40">     <rect id="taskrect_5_" x="89.1" y="24" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#000000" width="269.4" height="139.5">  </rect> </g> </svg>

properties.title: id
properties.description: This is a unique Id that distinguishes the form from other forms.

properties.title: name
properties.description: Name is an attribute that is text description of the form.

properties.title: version
properties.description: This defines the version number of the form model.

properties.title: head
properties.description: The form page's head markup.

properties.title: namespaces
properties.description: The original namespace declarations (serialized).

stencils.title: Input
stencils.description: An input control.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="152"    height="26"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="30 24" oryx:maximumSize="350 24" >     <rect oryx:anchor="top" oryx:resize="horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="150" height="24" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />  <g id="b">   <text font-size="11" x="3" y="11" oryx:align="middle left" oryx:anchor="top right bottom left" stroke="black">abc</text>  </g>         </g> </svg>

properties.title: default value
properties.description: The default value is displayed, when the form is loaded.

properties.title: inputmode
properties.description: Hint to the user agent to select an appropriate input mode for the text input

properties.title: appearance
properties.description: Optional attribute to define an appearance hint.

properties.title: incremental
properties.description: If true, this form control will generate additional xforms-value-changed events

properties.title: navindex
properties.description: Integer used to define the navigation sequence

properties.title: accesskey
properties.description: Shortcut for moving the input focus to this control

properties.title: type
properties.description: Any xsd:QName representing the expected datatype

properties.title: readonly
properties.description: Any expression that is convertible to XPath boolean

properties.title: required
properties.description: Any expression that is convertible to XPath boolean

properties.title: relevant
properties.description: Any expression that is convertible to XPath boolean

properties.title: calculate
properties.description: An expression used to calculate a string value for the associated instance data node

properties.title: constraint
properties.description: A predicate that needs to be satisfied for the associated instance data node to be considered valid

properties.title: p3ptype
properties.description: A P3P data element indicating the specific kind of data collected here

stencils.title: Range
stencils.description: Renders a control that allows selection from a sequential range of values
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="152"    height="26"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="30 24" oryx:maximumSize="350 24" >   <g>   <rect oryx:anchors="top" oryx:resize="horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="150" height="24" stroke="none" fill="#ffffff"/>   <g>    <rect oryx:resize="horizontal" x="0" y="6" width="150" height="1" stroke="none" fill="#000000"/>    <rect oryx:resize="horizontal" x="0" y="7" width="150" height="1" stroke="none" fill="#888888"/>       </g>  </g>   <g>   <line fill="none" stroke="#000000" x1="0.759" y1="20" x2="0.759" y2="24"/>   <line fill="none" stroke="#000000" x1="19.624" y1="20" x2="19.624" y2="24"/>   <line fill="none" stroke="#000000" x1="38.105" y1="20" x2="38.105" y2="24"/>   <line fill="none" stroke="#000000" x1="56.585" y1="20" x2="56.585" y2="24"/>   <line fill="none" stroke="#000000" x1="75.065" y1="20" x2="75.065" y2="24"/>   <line fill="none" stroke="#000000" x1="93.545" y1="20" x2="93.545" y2="24"/>   <line fill="none" stroke="#000000" x1="112.025" y1="20" x2="112.025" y2="24"/>   <line fill="none" stroke="#000000" x1="130.506" y1="20" x2="130.506" y2="24"/>   <line fill="none" stroke="#000000" x1="148.986" y1="20" x2="148.986" y2="24"/>  </g>   <g>   <rect x="25" y="0.5" stroke="#000000" width="6" height="10"/>   <polyline stroke="#000000" points="31,10 28,14 25,10"/>  </g>               </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Submit
stencils.description: Renders a submit button
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="153"    height="26"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="30 24" oryx:maximumSize="350 24" >     <rect oryx:anchor="top" oryx:resize="horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="150" height="24" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="#cccccc" />     <line fill="none" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="3" x1="4.25" y1="11.506" x2="17.75" y2="11.494"/> <polyline fill="none" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="3" points="13.172,5.532 19.077,11.438 13.172,17.343 "/>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: resource
properties.description: Attribute indicating the destination URI for submitting instance data.

properties.title: action
properties.description: DEPRECATED optional attribute indicating the destination URI for submitting instance data. Use resource attribute instead.

properties.title: mode
properties.description: This attribute controls whether or not the submission response processing is performed as part of the default processing of event xforms-submit.

properties.title: method
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying the protocol operation to be used to transmit the serialized instance data.

properties.title: validate
properties.description: Optional boolean attribute that indicates whether or not the data validation checks of the submission are performed.

properties.title: relevant
properties.description: Optional boolean attribute that indicates whether or not the relevance pruning of the submission is performed.

properties.title: serialization
properties.description: Optional attribute that controls how and whether to serialize instance data as part of the submission.

properties.title: version
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying the version of XML to be serialized.

properties.title: indent
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying whether the serializer should add extra white space nodes for readability.

properties.title: mediatype
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying the mediatype for XML serialization of instance data.

properties.title: encoding
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying an encoding for serialization.

properties.title: omit-xml-declaration
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying whether to omit the XML declaration on the serialized instance data.

properties.title: standalone
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying whether to include a standalone declaration in the serialized XML.

properties.title: cdata-section-elements
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying element names to be serialized with CDATA sections.

properties.title: replace
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying how the information returned after submit should be applied.

properties.title: instance
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying the instance to replace when the replace attribute value is 'instance'.

properties.title: target
properties.description: Optional attribute containing an XPath expression that indicates the target node for data replacement.

properties.title: separator
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying the separator character between name/value pairs in urlencoding.

properties.title: includenamespaceprefixes
properties.description: Optional attribute providing control over namespace serialization.

properties.title: appearance
properties.description: Optional attribute to define an appearance hint.

properties.title: navindex
properties.description: Integer used to define the navigation sequence

properties.title: accesskey
properties.description: Shortcut for moving the input focus to this control

stencils.title: Select

stencils.description: Causes its child actions to be invoked in the order that they are specified.

stencils.title: Set Value
stencils.description: This action explicitly sets the value of the specified instance data node.

stencils.title: Insert
stencils.description: This action is used to create one or more nodes of instance data by cloning one or more existing instance nodes.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">insert</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Delete
stencils.description: This action deletes one or more nodes from instance data.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">delete</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Set Index
stencils.description: This action marks a specific item as current in a repeating sequence.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">set index</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: repeat
properties.description: Required reference to a repeating element.

properties.title: index
properties.description: Required XPath expression that evaluates to a 1-based offset into the sequence.

stencils.title: Toggle
stencils.description: This action selects one possible case from an exclusive list of alternatives in a switch.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">toggle</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: case
properties.description: Optional reference to the case element to select.

stencils.title: Set Focus
stencils.description: This action dispatches an xforms-focus event to the element identified by attribute control.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">set focus</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: control
properties.description: Optional reference to a form control.

stencils.title: Dispatch
stencils.description: This action dispatches an XML Event to a specific target element.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">dispatch</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: name
properties.description: Optional name of the event to dispatch.

properties.title: target
properties.description: Optional reference to the event target.

properties.title: delay
properties.description: Optional attribute that indicates the minimum number of milliseconds to delay dispatching of the event to the target.

properties.title: bubbles
properties.description: Optional boolean indicating if this event bubbles.

properties.title: cancelable
properties.description: Optional boolean indicating if this event is cancelable.

stencils.title: Rebuild
stencils.description: This action results in rebuilding any internal data structures used to track computational dependencies among instance data nodes.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">rebuild</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: model
properties.description: Optional XForms Model selector.

stencils.title: Recalculate
stencils.description: This action causes that instance data nodes whose values need to be recalculated are updated.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">recalculate</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: model
properties.description: Optional XForms Model selector.

stencils.title: Revalidate
stencils.description: This action results in the instance data being revalidated as specified by the processing model.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">revalidate</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: model
properties.description: Optional XForms Model selector.

stencils.title: Refresh
stencils.description: This action results in the XForms user interface being refreshed.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">refresh</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: model
properties.description: Optional XForms Model selector.

stencils.title: Reset
stencils.description: This action is used to reset the instance data.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">reset</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: model
properties.description: Optional XForms Model selector.

stencils.title: Load
stencils.description: This action traverses the specified link.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">load</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: ref
properties.description: Optional link to an external resource to load.

properties.title: show
properties.description: Optional link behavior specifier.

stencils.title: Send
stencils.description: This action initiates submit processing.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">send</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: submission
properties.description: Optional reference to a submission element.

stencils.title: Message
stencils.description: This action encapsulates a message to be displayed to the to the user.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="52"    height="18"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>    <g oryx:minimumSize="50 16" oryx:maximumSize="50 16">     <rect oryx:anchor="top" x="0" y="0" width="50" height="16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="#FF5C5C" />      <g id="b">   <text font-size="9" font-weight="normal" x="25" y="6" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black">message</text>  </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: level
properties.description: Optional message level identifier.

properties.title: message
properties.description: Optional message text to show.
